text: @kanyewest I’m not giving @kanyewest my oxygen or vote I’m not pressed to provide my platform to support this nonsense. I tagged him he knows that he is not going to get a pass . My question is what is your comprehensive plan to tackle the Covid-19 epidemic spreading across America?
